summary: InfoTab refactor testing complete. The extraction of ~600 lines from ContactSheet.jsx into InfoTab.jsx was successful. All UI components render correctly and functionality is preserved. 9/10 UI tests passed (1 false negative due to selector issue).
critical_code_review_comments: All 46 props passed to InfoTab match between ContactSheet.jsx and InfoTab.jsx
No linting errors in either file
Component correctly exported as named export from InfoTab.jsx
seed_data_creation: Created test session for test_ui@leaderlix.com for UI testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: The InfoTab refactor is complete and working. ContactSheet.jsx now imports InfoTab from './contact-sheet/InfoTab'. The component receives all necessary props for: name fields, emails, phones, companies, LinkedIn, job title, location, country, buyer persona, stage, global roles, and case-specific roles.
